attributes.action: prevent credit card companies raising their standard rate to maximum rate on all debt outstanding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the latest initiative to force credit card companies to allow payment of most expensive debt first the Halifax have raised the interst rates on all outstanding debt to the maximum ie 29.95% by raising their standard rates to the maximum rate ie cash loan rate

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
